verbose_text: Considering r 2 greater than 0.20 as a useful LD level, we observed that the studied Canadian pig populations had useful average LD between more than 50% of the adjacent SNPs and between pair-wise SNPs located up to the distance of 0.98 Mbp for DU, 0.50 Mbp for YO, 0.45 Mbp for LA, and 0.25 Mbp for F1 populations.
